channel.title: Qd Earl's [Old Skool is in Session] Podcast
channel.description: A place for those music lovers who remember when it was all about having fun, getting along with everyone and having a night to remember...! You can also catch the live streaming shows at http://www.ustream.tv/channel/q-d-heart-break or http://www.ustream.tv/channel/go-with-the-flow Thanx for Listening!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Bringing Back the GOOD MUSIC & the GOOD TIMES!
channel.itunes:author: Q.D. Earl
channel.itunes:summary: A place for those music lovers who remember when it was all about having fun, getting along with everyone and having a night to remember...! You can also catch the live streaming shows at http://www.ustream.tv/channel/q-d-heart-break or http://www.ustream.tv/channel/go-with-the-flow Thanx for Listening!

item.title: U.M.M.'s QD Heart-Break SlowJamz Show [Ep.32]
item.description: Time to satisfy that "Love Jones", I know you're "Feenin" for that "Classic Soul and R&B" that you just don't hear enough of anymore! So, grab your drink, kick your feet up, chill....and Let's Go! 2nd Hr Spotlight on Michael Jackson & The Jackson 5! Original UStream Air Date: 9.29.10 Full Playlist can be found @ www.unlimitedmusicmerchants.com
item.dc:creator: Q.D. Earl
item.itunes:summary:
Time to satisfy that "Love Jones", I know you're "Feenin" for that "Classic Soul and R&B" that you just don't hear enough of anymore! So, grab your drink, kick your feet up, chill....and Let's Go!
2nd Hr Spotlight on Michael Jackson & The Jackson 5!

item.title: D.G.M.M. 2011 Xmas Show [Ep. 27]
item.description: Here it is, the last Soul Lounge mix for the year! We here @ U.M.M. would like to wish Happy Holidays to each and everyone of our loyal supporters and hope to see you all again in 2012! Back hitting you with some of the hottest Old School [Grown Folk] Party & SlowJam mixes around!
item.dc:creator: Q.D. Earl
item.itunes:summary: Here it is, the last Soul Lounge mix for the year! We here @ U.M.M. would like to wish Happy Holidays to each and everyone of our loyal supporters and hope to see you all again in 2012! Back hitting you with some of the hottest Old School [Grown Folk] Party & SlowJam mixes around!

item.title: U.M.M.'s QD Heart-Break SlowJamz Show [Ep.26]
item.description: Once Again, It's time to take a stroll down the Heart-Break Archives! Originally aired:10/13/10 2nd hr Spotlight on the group "One Way" along with the affiliates...Alicia Myers, Al Hudson, Oliver Cheatham, etc! So, you know the Drill! "Sit Back, put your feet up, grab your drink"....and Enjoy! PlayList Weekend Girl-The S.O.S. Band High In Me-Patrice Rushen Magic-Olivia Newton John Ain't No Woman (like the 1 I've got)-The Four Tops So So Satisfied-Ashford & Simpson Wishing on A Star-Rose Royce Do What You Gotta Do-Eddie Drennon & B.B.S Unlimited Stronger Than Before-Joyce Kennedy Goodbye-Central Line 12th House-Delegation I Want To Be Free-Ohio Players Singing Hey Yeah-Kids @ Work Reasons-Frankie Beverly Something From The Past-One Way U Me & The Other Guy-One Way Lost Inside Of You-Al Hudson & The Partners If U Play Your Cards Right-Alicia Myers Don't Stop-One Way Never Gonna Give you Up-Oliver Cheatham Lady You Are-One Way More Than Friends, Less Than Lovers-One Way Don't Do Me This Way-Alicia Myers I Want Your Love, I Need Your Love-Oliver Cheatham Love Is-One Way Toast To The Other Man-One Way It's Not The Same-The Manhattans Landlord-Gladys Knight & The pips Never Gonna Leave You-Eddie Kendricks You Mean Everything To Me-Black Ivory Living Together in Sin-The Whispers Making Love-Herbie Hancock Condition of The Heart-Prince I'll Give You Love-Sue Ann When You Touch Me-Skyy Start Me Up Again-Levert Say You Love Me-Patti Austin You Brought My Love To Life-Klique The Whole Town is Laughing At Me-Teddy Pendergrass
item.dc:creator: Q.D. Earl
item.itunes:summary:
Once Again, It's time to take a stroll down the Heart-Break Archives!
Originally aired:10/13/10
2nd hr Spotlight on the group "One Way" along with the affiliates...Alicia Myers, Al Hudson, Oliver Cheatham, etc!
So, you know the Drill! "Sit Back, put your feet up, grab your drink"....and Enjoy!
PlayList
Weekend Girl-The S.O.S. Band High In Me-Patrice Rushen Magic-Olivia Newton John Ain't No Woman (like the 1 I've got)-The Four Tops So So Satisfied-Ashford & Simpson Wishing on A Star-Rose Royce Do What You Gotta Do-Eddie Drennon & B.B.S Unlimited Stronger Than Before-Joyce Kennedy Goodbye-Central Line 12th House-Delegation I Want To Be Free-Ohio Players Singing Hey Yeah-Kids @ Work Reasons-Frankie Beverly Something From The Past-One Way U Me & The Other Guy-One Way Lost Inside Of You-Al Hudson & The Partners If U Play Your Cards Right-Alicia Myers Don't Stop-One Way Never Gonna Give you Up-Oliver Cheatham Lady You Are-One Way More Than Friends, Less Than Lovers-One Way Don't Do Me This Way-Alicia Myers I Want Your Love, I Need Your Love-Oliver Cheatham Love Is-One Way Toast To The Other Man-One Way It's Not The Same-The Manhattans Landlord-Gladys Knight & The pips Never Gonna Leave You-Eddie Kendricks You Mean Everything To Me-Black Ivory Living Together in Sin-The Whispers Making Love-Herbie Hancock Condition of The Heart-Prince I'll Give You Love-Sue Ann When You Touch Me-Skyy Start Me Up Again-Levert Say You Love Me-Patti Austin You Brought My Love To Life-Klique The Whole Town is Laughing At Me-Teddy Pendergrass

item.title: D.G.M.M's Nov. Birthday "Scorpio" Mix [Ep. 25]
item.description: If you missed last month's Soul lounge event, You missed the Nov. babies after show Birthday jam! Check it out!
item.dc:creator: Q.D. Earl
item.itunes:summary: If you missed last month's Soul lounge event, You missed the Nov. babies after show Birthday jam! Check it out!

item.title: U.M.M. does CD.101 vol.1 [Ep.24]
item.description: Don't front! You miss'em, I miss'em WE ALL miss the smooth jazz of 101.9FM [tri-state area] lol! But don't get all ballistic! I gotcha covered! here's the 1st in maybe an ongoing series [let me know if you wanna HEAR some smooth jazz..!] So get your headphones and a tall glass and Let's Go!
item.dc:creator: Q.D. Earl
item.itunes:summary: Don't front! You miss'em, I miss'em WE ALL miss the smooth jazz of 101.9FM [tri-state area] lol! But don't get all ballistic! I gotcha covered! here's the 1st in maybe an ongoing series [let me know if you wanna HEAR some smooth jazz..!] So get your headphones and a tall glass and Let's Go!

item.title: Old School Classic BBQ Boogie [ep.23]
item.description: The weather may be dreary outside, but your spirit needn't be! C'mon and get'cha Groove On with a little "sittin' in the backyard w/ the grill blazin'" Old School Jam! Summer'll Be Back Before U Know It! Let's Go!
item.dc:creator: Q.D. Earl
item.itunes:summary:
The weather may be dreary outside, but your spirit needn't be! C'mon and get'cha Groove On with a little "sittin' in the backyard w/ the grill blazin'" Old School Jam! Summer'll Be Back Before U Know It!
Let's Go!

item.title: U.M.M.'s QD Heart Break (Ep.21)
item.description: Yes, it's time once again to grab that special someone close & turn up the heat! Lord knows it's been hot enough outside, lol! Thank God for A/C LMAO! Enjoy! Originally Aired : 1/20/10 All Heart-Break Playlists can be found @ www.unlimitedmusicmerchants.com Under the original air date

item.title: U.M.M.'s Go With Da Flow (Ep. 20) Father's Day Jam!
item.description: Whether you were outside on the Grill or inside on the Couch-These are the sounds to nod your head to! O.K. Daddy.....Let's Go!

item.title: DJ Raheem Classick- Dreamz Of Love (Ep.19)
item.description: DJ Raheem Classick is Back! This time he's mellowing out the pace, and throwing it out to the ladies! How many "Dreamz of Love" have YOU had lately? ...inquiring minds wanna know....!
item.dc:creator: Q.D. Earl
item.itunes:summary:
DJ Raheem Classick is Back!
This time he's mellowing out the pace, and throwing it out to the ladies!
How many "Dreamz of Love" have YOU had lately?
...inquiring minds wanna know....!

item.title: DJ Raheem Classick - "Hard 2 Find Classics" (Ep.18)
item.description: Here's a treat! UMM's DeeJay extraordinaire Raheem Classick drops some old school science for those who know 'bout "Diggin' in the Crates" Hot off the UStream live Broadcast, 2 hrs of bumpin' old school classics you probably NEVER heard before! ...And That's what it's all about, bringing you the jams you just don't find on your everyday radio & internet stations! Let's Go!
item.dc:creator: Q.D. Earl
